-- Hoogle documentation, generated by Haddock
-- See Hoogle, http://www.haskell.org/hoogle/


-- | Time a computation
--   
--   A simple wrapper of an IO computation to show the used CPU time.
@package timeit
@version 1.0.0.0

module System.TimeIt

-- | Wrap an <a>IO</a> computation so that it prints out the execution
--   time.
timeIt :: IO a -> IO a

-- | Wrap an <a>IO</a> computation so that it returns execution time is
--   seconds as well as the real value.
timeItT :: IO a -> IO (Double, a)
